name: tech.toml

architecture.description:
Single SPA combining documentation portal and MVP prototype.
Source files (TOML/Markdown) are converted to JSON at build time.

rawContent:
# Technical Stack

[stack]
runtime = "Node.js 20+"
language = "TypeScript 5.x"
framework = "React 19"
styling = "Tailwind CSS 4"
bundler = "Vite 6"
orm = "Prisma 7 (schema validation only)"

[architecture]
type = "Single Page Application"
pattern = "File-driven"
description = """
Single SPA combining documentation portal and MVP prototype.
Source files (TOML/Markdown) are converted to JSON at build time.
"""

[folders]
core = "Engine code (app, builder, dev-server)"
src = "Content (docs, prototype)"
instructions = "LLM instructions (root level)"

[dependencies.state]
name = "zustand"
purpose = "Simple state management"

[dependencies.forms]
name = "react-hook-form + zod"
purpose = "Form validation"

[dependencies.routing]
name = "react-router-dom"
purpose = "Client-side routing"
